query:
SELECT u.name, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as totalLojas
FROM users u
JOIN gestores g ON u.id = g.userId
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Carlos Eduardo%'
GROUP BY u.id, u.name;

LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
